START.name: a random street in Gotham
START.desc:
This random street seems unfamilair to you. You don't know where it is within the city of Gotham. It's quiet and lonley.
But as the hero Nightwing you aren't all too fazed by it.

items.desc:
*BUZZ* *BUZZ* *BUZZ*

Your phone is ringing on the ground!
items.take:
You pick up the phone and answer. 

Alfred: Master Grayson... I mean Nighting, I hope you're alright, seems like you were knocked out in a random street by a couple of thugs. I'm calling 
because Batman needs to talk to you. He's somewhere in the city, find him. And try to stay out of trouble...
 *hangs up*

CRMA.name: Crime Alley
CRMA.desc: This is the street Batman's parents were murdered in. You can see the outline of the Wayne's, but no sign of Batman

OTC.name: the outer city Gotham
OTC.desc:
As you walk a little further you find youself outside of Gotham. A single road is present that leads to the city of Metropolis. Hmmm you wonder what 
Superman is doing...

JKT.name: Joker Territory
JKT.desc: You can tell Joker is nearby by all the chaos around. Buildings are burning, people are laughing, and police sirens fill the air.

JKB.name: Joker's Bar
JKB.desc:
You walk into a bar full of Joker thugs, and the Price of Crime himself. 

Joker: Well, well well... if it isn't the old robin. Came to say hi? Did you hear about new robin? HAHAHAHAHA, you could say he got the Killing Joke.
 Now you're next...

GTP.name: Gotham Park
GTP.desc: This park is usually full of happy and romantic cizitens. Today it's quiet, and not a single person is here. You wonder if this has anything to do with Batman.

items.desc: You see your Escrima sticks on the ground next to a trash can. You wonder how they got there.
items.take:
You pick up the Escrima Sticks 
 I doubt you'll be able to use them now, but they do look cool!

WYNE.name: Wayne Enterprise
WYNE.desc: A very tall building is presented in front of you. When you go inside you stumble across a huge elevator that leads UP the building

HRTGH.name: the Heart of Gotham City
HRTGH.desc:
The streets are very busy and loud. Every buidling in sight glows with bright neon lights. Everyone seems to be having a good time. 
This is the reason why you love staying in Gotham, that and beating criminals up in the name of justice.

GTHB.name: Gotham Bay
GTHB.desc: All you can see is water beyond this point. Trash fills up the bay. You should probably turn back, you won't find Batman here.

TWOFAT.name: Two Face's Territory
TWOFAT.desc:
Half of this place is burned up and the other side is perfectly fine. It's pretty ironic. You can see some stairs that go UP into a courthouse. 
You wonder what Two Face is up to.

TWOCRT.name: Two Face's Courthouse
TWOCRT.desc:
As soon as you walk in you're treated with the barrel of a gun right to your head. 

TwoFace: If it isn't Nightwing... 
	WE knew you'd come, WE have eyes all over the city... 
	You must pay for your crimes against US with justice... 
	NO! He dies right here, right now... 
	Looks like we have to refer to the old coin for this one... 

Two Face flips the coin. 
You don't know how which side it landed on...

SWH.name: the Sewer Hole Entrance
SWH.desc:
The smell is unbearable, and it's not just the waste coming from it. Further east you can hear what seems to be a loud roar followed by a human scream. 
Your noble and heroic personality is making it hard for you not to follow the sound.

KLRC.name: the Deep of the Sewer
KLRC.desc:
It's dark but you can sense a large figure in front of you. 

 Killer Croc: Has the Bat brought a meal for me?...

GRGLR.name: the Gargoyle Building
GRGLR.desc:
A very tall building in front of you with those famous gargoyles. It seems like the kind up building 
Batman would like to do his brooding on. You can see a ladder the goes UP to the gargoyles and roof.

BATMAN.name: Lonely Rooftop
BATMAN.desc:
There no one here... 
But you feel a weird presense

	Batman: Nightwing. Good you came. I need you help, Arkham Asylum is at Code Red! The Riddler, 
Bane, and Scarecrow are behind it all...

PARTY.name: a Party?
PARTY.desc:
You open the doors to the big guest room. Upon opening it the music stops and everyone looks to you. Everyone you know is here: Barbara, Tim, Gordon, 
Damian, Jason, Lucius, and Alfred.

 Alfred: Master Grayson ummmm... I thought you were looking for Bruce. This isn't what it looks like.

You should probabaly leave before this gets any more awkward.
